statements: INSERT INTO WineTastingNotes (id, expert_name, wine_name, region, vintage_year, flavor_notes) VALUES (1, 'Alice Smith', 'Chardonnay', 'Napa Valley', 2018, 'Buttery and oaky notes with a hint of citrus.')
